results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከዚያም የረጋ ደም ኾነ (አላህ ሰው አድርጎ) ፈጠረውም፡፡ አስተካከለውም፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከእርሱም ሁለት ዓይነቶችን ወንድና ሴትን አደረገ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ይህ (ጌታ) ሙታንን ሕያው በማድረግ ላይ ቻይ አይደለምን?
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
